meanings.definition: The total number of people employed by a company or in a particular country or area.
meanings.sent1: The workforce at the factory includes all the employees.
meanings.sent2: The workforce in the city is diverse and hardworking.
meanings.sent3: The workforce decided to have a picnic in the break room.
meanings.sent4: The workforce is the engine that drives the economy forward.
meanings.sent5: The workforce diligently completes their tasks every day.

meanings.definition: The group of people who are available to work or who are working in a particular company or industry.
meanings.sent1: The workforce of skilled professionals is in high demand.
meanings.sent2: The workforce of the tech company is innovative and dynamic.
meanings.sent3: The workforce organized a surprise birthday party for their boss.
meanings.sent4: The workforce is a well-oiled machine, working together seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The workforce strives for excellence in all their endeavors.
